description: Retrieves information of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The string name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the SageMaker Cluster is created.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: The failure message of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceGroups
nested_items.description: The instance groups of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: CurrentCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances that are currently in the instance group of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: TargetCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances you specified to add to the instance group of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the instance group of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the instance group of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: LifeCycleConfig
nested_items.description: Details of LifeCycle configuration for the instance group.

nested_items.name: SourceS3Uri
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 bucket path where your lifecycle scripts are stored.

nested_items.name: OnCreate
nested_items.description: The file name of the entrypoint script of lifecycle scripts under SourceS3Uri. This entrypoint script runs during cluster creation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRole
nested_items.description: The execution role for the instance group to assume.

nested_items.name: ThreadsPerCore
nested_items.description: The number you specified to TreadsPerCore in CreateCluster for enabling or disabling multithreading. For instance types that support multithreading, you can specify 1 for disabling multithreading and 2 for enabling multithreading. For more information, see the reference table of CPU cores and threads per CPU core per instance type in the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud User Guide.

nested_items.name: InstanceStorageConfigs
nested_items.description: The additional storage configurations for the instances in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumeConfig
nested_items.description: Defines the configuration for attaching additional Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) volumes to the instances in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group. The additional EBS volume is attached to each instance within the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group and mounted to /opt/sagemaker.

nested_items.name: VolumeSizeInGB
nested_items.description: The size in gigabytes (GB) of the additional EBS volume to be attached to the instances in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group. The additional EBS volume is attached to each instance within the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group and mounted to /opt/sagemaker.

nested_items.name: OnStartDeepHealthChecks
nested_items.description: A flag indicating whether deep health checks should be performed when the cluster instance group is created or updated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the cluster instance group.
InService: The instance group is active and healthy.
Creating: The instance group is being provisioned.
Updating: The instance group is being updated.
Failed: The instance group has failed to provision or is no longer healthy.
Degraded: The instance group is degraded, meaning that some instances have failed to provision or are no longer healthy.
Deleting: The instance group is being deleted.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN); of the training plan associated with this cluster instance group.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the training plan associated with this cluster instance group.

nested_items.name: OverrideVpcConfig
nested_items.description: The customized Amazon VPC configuration at the instance group level that overrides the default Amazon VPC configuration of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your training job or model. For information about the availability of specific instance types, see Supported Instance Types and Availability Zones.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ScheduledUpdateConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration object of the schedule that SageMaker follows when updating the AMI.

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: A cron expression that specifies the schedule that SageMaker follows when updating the AMI.

nested_items.name: DeploymentConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration to use when updating the AMI versions.

nested_items.name: RollingUpdatePolicy
nested_items.description: The policy that SageMaker uses when updating the AMI versions of the cluster.

nested_items.name: MaximumBatchSize
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can update at a time.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether SageMaker should process the update by amount or percentage of instances.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Specifies the amount or percentage of instances SageMaker updates at a time.

nested_items.name: RollbackMaximumBatchSize
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of instances in the cluster that SageMaker can roll back at a time.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether SageMaker should process the update by amount or percentage of instances.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Specifies the amount or percentage of instances SageMaker updates at a time.

nested_items.name: WaitIntervalInSeconds
nested_items.description: The duration in seconds that SageMaker waits before updating more instances in the cluster.

nested_items.name: AutoRollbackConfiguration
nested_items.description: An array that contains the alarms that SageMaker monitors to know whether to roll back the AMI update.

nested_items.name: AlarmName
nested_items.description: The name of the alarm.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that your SageMaker jobs, hosted models, and compute resources have access to. You can control access to and from your resources by configuring a VPC. For more information, see Give SageMaker Access to Resources in your Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your training job or model. For information about the availability of specific instance types, see Supported Instance Types and Availability Zones.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Orchestrator
nested_items.description: The type of orchestrator used for the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EKS cluster associated with the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeRecovery
nested_items.description: The node recovery mode configured for the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.
